page.title: 20TRANSPORT
page.content: Transport is solely private or privately hired. There is no {PUBLIC {TRANSPORT} at all in the area, so it is virtually essential for residents to own their own cars, vans, etc.. There is a {SCHOOL MINIBUS} provided and most farmers have {TRACTORS}which, apart from normal farm use, are greatly appreciated in winter when more conventional vehicles have problems on the steep hills, especially in snow or icy conditions. Private Hire Coaches are available locally for specific outings arranged by local groups. There is no petrol filling station in North Huish; the nearest being at Avonwick or at Ugborough.
